sentences.sentence: The specimen will be safely transferred into a biohazard bag.
sentences.translation: 用生物危害袋安全地运送标本。

sentences.sentence: Special short grey biohazard incineration bins will be used for instruments, supplies, garbage and linens.
sentences.translation: 专门的矮灰色焚化箱用于器械、辅助材料、垃圾和亚麻织物。
